news.title: Cricket is a bat and ball game, played between two teams
news.author: Ujjwal Bhardwaj
news.details: Cricket is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of eleven players on a cricket field  the centre of which is a rectangular 22 - yard - long pitch with a wicket(a set of three wooden stumps topped by two bails) at each end.
